titleStmt.title: Truth from Ireland exprest in two letters. The one from the city of Dublin, the other from Tredah, to a gentleman of good quality in the City of London. Relating the condition of Dublin, Vlster, Wexford, and Waterford.
titleStmt.author: G. T.
E. W.

publicationStmt.publisher: Aprill 22. Printed for Iohn Wright, in the Old-Bailey,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
